reviewText: This listing says it is for a DVD which presents the technologies being developed by several companies persuing entries into the alternative energy field.  The previous poster clearly did not bother to read ANY of the text before entering a 1 star review.  I gave it one star as well, not because I couldn't figure out how to buy the mystery mat, but because I thought the product was overpriced.  Looks like a Discovery Channel episode included in the cost of basic cable to me.
I was looking for alternative energy items and came across this picture of a man holding a piece of what looks like mat. What is the item being sold? I can't tell - can you?
